title: Serif, curved crossbar
content:
Hello,

This was found on a promotional book for the Davines hair care products  
Can someone identify this typeface ?

Cheers,  
L.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_1520.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820065129/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1520.JPG) | 780.8 KB |
author: laurent

comments.content:
It must be **[Ehrhardt MT (SemiBold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820065129/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Ehrhardt%20MT%20Semi%20-%20Bold&fid=95dd4fee92f0a18ee0995bf600d05495&fsize=48&text=GLORIFYING%20HAIR%20CARE%20SYSTEM&wrap=2)** available from Monotype, Adobe, Linotype

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820065129/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Never heard of "Find my Font" before, i'll give this a try.  
Thanks !
